item.title: How to Deploy an AngularJS App on Heroku
item.description: Or getting an EAN app running on Heroku EAN rather than MEAN because we’ll be using Express, AngularJS and Node but not Mongo this time. When googling deploying an AngularJS app to Heroku, all the tutorials I looked at (i.e. the top 3 in the first page of results …) assumed I’d cloned the Angular seed app - which I hadn’t and didn’t want to. I had a dead simple one controller, one service AngularJS app (note: 1.
